summary: This is an email exchange between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding scheduling a meeting to discuss the 'Epstein detention reply memo.' It indicates active work by the office on Jeffrey Epstein's detention status in July 2019.

persons.name: Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney
persons.role: Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The sender of an email requesting to reschedule a meeting to discuss the 'Epstein detention reply memo' for Tuesday at 11am.

events.title: Email Exchange on Epstein Detention Memo
events.description: Email correspondence within the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding scheduling a meeting to work on the 'Epstein detention reply memo.'
personsInvolved: Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively working on a 'detention reply memo' for Jeffrey Epstein in July 2019.
The email exchange shows internal coordination and scheduling for work on Epstein's case.
The subject 'Pipeline' and high importance suggest this was a priority matter for the office.
